import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';// Sample food items
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const foodItems=[{id:1,name:'🍎 Apple'},{id:2,name:'🍞 Bread'},{id:3,name:'🥛 Milk'}];function App(){const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[bought,setBought]=useState([]);const[screen,setScreen]=useState(1);// To manage which screen to display
const[costs,setCosts]=useState({});// Add item to cart
const addToCart=item=>{if(!cart.includes(item)){setCart([...cart,item]);}};// Move item to bought
const moveToBought=item=>{setBought([...bought,item]);setCart(cart.filter(i=>i!==item));};// Set cost for an item
const handleCostChange=(item,value)=>{setCosts({...costs,[item]:value});};// Calculate total cost
const calculateTotal=()=>{return cart.reduce((total,item)=>total+(parseFloat(costs[item])||0),0);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[screen===1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Select Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"food-icons",children:foodItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(item.name),children:item.name},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Cart:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:item},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setScreen(2),children:"Go Shopping"})]}),screen===2&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Items to Buy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[item," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>moveToBought(item),children:"Bought"})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setScreen(3),children:"Next"})]}),screen===3&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add Costs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[item,":"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",onChange:e=>handleCostChange(item,e.target.value)})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Total: $",calculateTotal()]})]})]});}export default App;
